name: Linkedin (OAuth2)
desc:
LinkedIn is the worlds largest business social networking hub.
The Linkedin REST API provides a simple, consistent representation of people, companies, jobs, and the interactions and relationships between them.

values.r_basicprofile: Name, photo, headline, and current positions
values.r_fullprofile: Full profile including experience, education, skills, and recommendations
values.r_emailaddress: The primary email address you use for your LinkedIn account
values.r_contactinfo: Address, phone number, and bound accounts
values.rw_nus: Retrieve and post updates to LinkedIn as you
values.rw_company_admin: Edit company pages for which I am an Admin and post status updates on behalf of those companies
values.rw_groups: Retrieve and post group discussions as you
values.w_messages: Send messages and invitations to connect as you
